meanings.definition: The rounded knob at the center of a shield.
meanings.sent1: The knight's shield had a shiny umbos in the middle.
meanings.sent2: The umbos on the shield was intricately designed.
meanings.sent3: The umbos on the shield looked like a small, round gem.
meanings.sent4: The umbos on the shield gleamed like a polished stone.
meanings.sent5: The umbos on the shield stood out, catching the sunlight.

meanings.definition: The central boss or protuberance of a bivalve shell.
meanings.sent1: The clam's umbos were hard and protective.
meanings.sent2: She marveled at the intricate patterns on the umbos of the shell.
meanings.sent3: The umbos of the clam shell reminded her of tiny mountains.
meanings.sent4: The umbos of the shell were like tiny fortresses guarding the clam.
meanings.sent5: The umbos of the shell were the clam's shield against predators.

meanings.definition: The central point of a convex surface.
meanings.sent1: The artist carefully highlighted the umbos of the curved sculpture.
meanings.sent2: The umbos of the dome added depth to the architecture.
meanings.sent3: The umbos of the curved surface looked like a small hill.
meanings.sent4: The umbos of the dome stood out like a beacon in the design.
meanings.sent5: The umbos of the curved surface caught the eye with their prominence.
